roleset.name: put on decorations, putting decorations on something
roleset.note: DECORATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'decorate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 9.8, 25.3, Framenet entry Adorning. (from decorate.01-v predicate notes)
DECORATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on BOLT DF-07. Framed by Claire. (from decoration.01-n)

example.name: passive as verb
example.text: The spaghetti is made by the Al Ghazel Macaroni Co. in Bethlehem and is marketed in [a package]-1 decorated *trace*-1 with green, black, red and white stripes.
example.arg: with green, black, red and white stripes

example.name: passive as adjective
example.text: Linda and Michael (Ms. Close and Mr. Woods), who seem to be pushing 40, live in a large and tastefully decorated home in suburban Seattle.

example.name: 'tis the season
example.text: John decorated his Christmas tree with dirty socks.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: ... how intrigued and impressed Kathryn and I were at her unique, attractive decoration of the dining table with ordinary, simple breadfruit leaves.
